metadata.title: CVE-2024-13454 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Weak encryption algorithm in Easy-RSA version 3.0.5 through 3.1.7 allows alocal attacker to more easily bruteforce the private CA key when createdusing OpenSSL 3

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-13454` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

easy-rsa - 3.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: easy-rsa package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-1').
